attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2016-0243

Date: 2016-04-15

Whereas The District of Saltcoats Board of Trade, in Saskatchewan, the certificate of formation of which was recorded pursuant to the Boards of Trade Act on May 31, 1898, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, dissolves The District of Saltcoats Board of Trade.


 

Attendu que The District of Saltcoats Board of Trade (Saskatchewan), dont le certificat de formation a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 31 mai 1898, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil dissout The District of Saltcoats Board of Trade.
